titleStmt.title: The hasty wedding; or, William's patience rewarded: with the consent of pretty Nancy. To the tune of, The man of fashion, or, The doubting virgin.
titleStmt.author: Bowne, Tobias.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for, P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball in Pye-corner.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Tobias Bowne by Wing.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Also identified as Wing (2nd ed.) H1139.
Item at A6:2[50] imperfect: heavily stained.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
